summary: ULTIMATE MAGE ARMOR And SPELLS optimized for Legendary Difficulty.(Recommeded)
descriptionHtml:
THE ULTIMATE MAGE ARMOR + SPELLS

1) Added  Armor to cloth  armor  becouse Skyrim legendary difficulty and be Mage sucks Everything will kill you with 100 base armor :P
Now its MASSIVELY OP WITH cloth armor been light armor and it depence how much you have the Light armor perk its logical to your lv and so you can run ! but gives as much armor as a heavy armor !

2) Every Cloth amor (is light amor now) its from the most Purfect set (my Opinion) for a Mage with no wierd mod for other armors and staff like that olny the clothes that the Vanilla has ...

3)The cloth armor is NOT enchanted so you can enchanted to the bonus of your likes (EXEPT THE BODY ARMOR THATS I PUT THE BEST BONUS WITH LOGICAL GAME PLAY )(It would not be nice exprience if you have something like 100000 magic regen and 300000 more dmg Yeah i fk everything YOOOHOOOU and now what? the bonus are resonable for Lengedary difficualty!

4)Becouse is the best armor and unique and don't wont anyone be like lets take the armor and start fk  things , meeeh , it would be too EZ and TOO EZ its not FUN :P sooo ...

YOU NEED TO HAVE :

100 lv Destraction magic

AND

END QUESTS OF MAGE COLLAGE (To become Arch mage)

sooo when you be WORTHY of been called a REAL MAGE you should deserve the armor 

Recommeded also is to have 100 Enchanting and the (Ahzidal's Armor) http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ahzidal's_Armor

to get the armor you must have the Arch mage key and go to the Arch mage room in a display its a key that open the chest ! 

5) The Spells are EXACTLY the same in Apiarence AND the olny Change is the DMG TOOO LOW for LENGEDARY DEFFICUALTY and for 50-60 lv + player :/ soo with that fixed you will be ok !
 
ITS 3 "NEW" spells like 2 EXPERT ones And 1 MASTER one .. so the skills are the Incinerate , Icy Spear and the Lightning Storm   so its 1 fire 1 Ice and 1 lighting so you can pick what ever you need !! 


Now with v1.0.2 2 new spells  Mystic Ignite and Mystic Freeze *(updated)
whats new about them ?
Mystic Ignite do more dmg now , Mystic freeze now does dmg over time like Ignite and both has the ability to stuck the dmg
*(E.g. if ingite and freeze 10 dps if you hit the target again the target will get now 20 dps until the 15 secs of the first hit ends )

HOPE YOU ENJOY IT !!! HAVE FUN !!!
author: ThanOs74
